meaningMnemonic: A <radical>dirt</radical> <radical>demon</radical> is just a <kanji>lump</kanji>. Just like a dust bunny is just a clump of dust.
readingMnemonic: Have you ever heard of the game "Katamari Damacy?" That game is about a little guy who rolls a ball around, turning it into a bigger and bigger <kanji>lump</kanji>. What do you think the <reading>Katamari</reading> (かたまり) part means? It means lump, of course.
